org.agilewiki.utils.ids.composites

Class SecondaryId

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.utils.ids.composites.SecondaryId

  • public class SecondaryId
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of secondary ids for a Versioned Map Node (VMN).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SECONDARY_ID
      Identifies an id as a composite for a secondary id.
      static java.lang.String SECONDARY_INV
      Identifies an id as a composite for an inverted secondary id.
